name: fatmcgav-glassfish
author: Gavin Williams
description: A resource type to manage Glassfish domains, system-properties, jdbc-connection-pools and jdbc-resources and application deployment.
summary: A resource type to manage Glassfish domains, system-properties, jdbc-connection-pools and jdbc-resources and application deployment.

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The system property key.

parameters.name: value
parameters.doc: The system property value.

parameters.name: portbase
parameters.doc: The Glassfish domain port base. Default: 4800

parameters.name: asadminuser
parameters.doc: The internal Glassfish user asadmin uses. Default: admin

parameters.name: passwordfile
parameters.doc: The file containing the password for the user.

parameters.name: user
parameters.doc: The user to run the command as.

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The Glassfish domain name.

parameters.name: smf
parameters.doc: Create Solaris SMF service. Default: true

parameters.name: startoncreate
parameters.doc: Start the domain immediately after it is created. Default: true

parameters.name: portbase
parameters.doc: The Glassfish domain port base. Default: 4800

parameters.name: asadminuser
parameters.doc: The internal Glassfish user asadmin uses. Default: admin

parameters.name: passwordfile
parameters.doc: The file containing the password for the user.

parameters.name: user
parameters.doc: The user to run the command as.

parameters.name: asadminpath
parameters.doc: The path to asadmin file.

parameters.doc: The user to run the command as.

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The realm name.

parameters.name: classname
parameters.doc: The Java class name. Ex. com.sun.identity.agents.appserver.v81.AmASRealm

parameters.name: properties
parameters.doc: The properties. Ex. jaas-context=agentRealm

parameters.name: isdefault
parameters.doc: Sets realm to default if true.

parameters.doc: The Glassfish domain port base. Default: 4800

parameters.name: asadminuser
parameters.doc: The internal Glassfish user asadmin uses. Default: admin

parameters.name: passwordfile

parameters.name: user
parameters.doc: The user to run the command as.

types.name: jdbcresource
types.doc: Manage JDBC resources of Glassfish domains

parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The JDBC connection pool name.

parameters.name: datasourceclassname
parameters.doc: The data source class name. Ex. com.mysql.jdbc.jdbc2.optional.MysqlConnectionPoolDataSource

parameters.name: resourcetype
parameters.doc: The resource type. Ex. javax.sql.ConnectionPoolDataSource

parameters.name: properties
parameters.doc: The properties. Ex. user=myuser:password=mypass:url=jdbc:mysql://myhost.ex.com:3306/mydatabase
